title: Cupid's Maze
description: A short story available free on Smashwords, B&N, Apple Bookstore, Sony eReader Store, Kobo, and Diesel Sean has popped the question and dreads the drive across the bleak Kansas landscape on Valentine's Day to announce his intentions to his fiancee Janet's parents. When he sees a sign for a corn maze, he pulls in for a momentary reprieve. Little does he know what a mistake he's made.
author: Mark Souza
